categories: Category:Conflicts of the Outer Rim Territories

nodes.text: Thousands of years before the Clone Wars, the Galactic Republic launched an anti-slavery campaign within the Outer Rim Territories. As part of that campaign, the Jedi Order serving the Republic especially targeted the notorious Zygerrian slavers, which resulted in a brutal Jedi–Zygerrian conflict that ended with the complete defeat of the Zygerrians.
